    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Amount_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Amount_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Amount description="Example String Value" percentage="10" quantity="1234" unitName="Example String Value" unitPrice="100.0000" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Total currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</Total>
    <ChargeUnit>Per unit</ChargeUnit>
</Amount>

      Example JSON

      {
  "AmountSummary" : {
    "unitPrice" : 100.0000,
    "unitName" : "Example String Value",
    "quantity" : 1234,
    "percentage" : 10,
    "description" : "Example String Value",
    "Total" : {
      "value" : 80000,
      "currencyCode" : "USD",
      "minorUnit" : 2
    },
    "ChargeUnit" : {
      "value" : "Per unit"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Total
        The total for a specific item in a calculation.
        Details
        Type CurrencyAmount
        Example Value 80000
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ChargeUnit
        Used to indicate what the cost is based on (per room, per room per night, etc).
        Details
        Type ChargeUnit_Enum
        Example Value Per unit
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        unitPrice
        This is used in conjunction with UnitName to specify the charge per unit as defined by UnitName (e.g., if UnitCharge="100" and UnitName="day" the result is 100 dollars per day).
        Details
        Type Money
        Example Value 100.00
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        unitName
        The UnitName attribute provides the unit on which an item charge may be based when purchasing a round of golf.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        quantity
        This is used in conjunction with UnitName to specify the quantity of units as defined by UnitName (e.g., if Quantity="5" and UnitName="day" the result is 5 days).
        Details
        Type NonNegativeInteger
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        percentage
        Provides the ability to define a particular percentage.
        Details
        Type Percent
        Example Value 10
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        description
        Description of the priced item.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Alias Summary

        Aliases 
        Price_Summary
